inclusion.criterion: Veterans from all sex/gender, race, and ethnicity will be recruited
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All subjects will undergo post-bronchodilator spirometry and be clinically stable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All subjects must have documented FEV1/FVC ratio of <0.7, and between 30% to 80% FEV1% predicted
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Potential subjects must have a BMI of less than 35 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Confounding effects such as neurological, musculoskeletal, or metabolic disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects taking medications that alter mood or metabolic demand will be excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
